job_description:
Lead Software Engineer (m/f/d)



Location: Munich

Department: Responsible for the Tech & Infrastructure

Reports to: CEO

Headcount: Company wide: 10 FTE, Tech Department: 2 Sr. Engineers



Your Mission:

Our customer is a B2B SaaS company that protects any product on the internet (Remove.tech).

Remove.tech grew from 0 to 800k in ARR within 1,5 years and is a bootstrapped remote company founded in Vienna, Austria.

The founders are looking for a founding engineer / CTO who is proactively driving the Technology side of the company in order to scale to 10 Mio ARR within the next 5 years, bootstrapped.



Your first half-year might look like this:

After 1 month you’ll

 * Finished the company onboarding

 * Have met your entire team and understood the product and how our customers are using it

 * Spent time shadowing your team, the founders and talked to customers directly

 * understand the company strategy, mission, value proposition and 2025 targets



After 3 months you’ll

 * Have identified low-hanging fruits based on your discovery and previous experience and implement short-term wins

 * Have built a foundation of trust with your peers and team to be able to take ownership of decisions

 * Having a rough plan on the tech strategy to deliver 10x growth in 5 years based on the time you spend with customers, your team and the founders

 * Spent time with customers, bi-weekly

 * Understood the tech infrastructure and code

 * Ship code weekly



After 6 months you’ll

 * Have a clear tech strategy in mind to achieve 10x growth in 5 years

 * Proactively shape the company's direction, goals and objectives on the tech side

 * Have re-structured the code base and took full ownership of all tech-contributing activities

 * Spend time with customers, bi-weekly




Your Responsibilities

 * Develop and implement technology strategies to grow from EUR 1 to 10M in ARR within 5 years.

 * Lead and coordinate all technical functions striving for customer centricity and profitable growth and build a team of strong independent senior engineers or juniors with high potential.

 * Understand the requirements of existing customers to ensure their needs are being met and meet with customers bi-weekly

 * Build a standarized and high quality code base to ensure a high valuation of the company through a scalabale tech stack, code base and team. We could be acquired and you would benefit from the share value.

 * Contribute to hiring by clearly articulating expectations of how top candidates look like and help to evaluate and close them



Your profile

 * Proven experience in building outstanding products, ideally in a B2B SaaS start-up.

 * 6+ years of relevant work experience; min. 5 years in coding

 * Hands-on attitude with a desire to take ownership of tasks and responsibilities;

 * Proven experience in customer centric and agile environments

 * Outstanding communication and interpersonal abilities

 * Desire to work in fast-paced scale-up and passion to work with digital products and services

 * Strong strategic thinking and analytical skills, with the ability to translate insights into actionable technical strategies and operational plans.

 * Excellent leadership and people management skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate cross-functional teams to achieve technical goals.

 * Experience in developing and implementing devops processes.


What you’ll get:

 * Being part of our supportive, curious, hands-on and independent culture.

 * Joining a independent bootstrapped start-up in the B2B SaaS field.

 * An entrepreneurial company culture with flat hierarchies

 * Remote, flexible in working from other countries or locations.

 * State of the art hardware and software.



About Us
pplwise supports leading, fast-growing companies across Europe in delivering on their growth plans. Our services include Recruiting as a Service & Executive Search specializing in the support of technology companies during their growth phases.

We work with publicly traded companies like Uber or JustEatTakeaway, Unicorns like Clark, TIER or Taxfix and countless start-ups and scale-ups funded by top venture capital funds like Sequoia Capital, HV Capital or Cherry Ventures.

pplwise was founded in 2021 and already operated in +20 countries across Europe with a team of +20 talented Talent Partners. Ambitious technology companies manage growth phases with pplwise.

Compensation Range: €80K - €120K

job_description:
SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT ENGINEER (M/F/D) - AEROSPACE

Workplace: 80639, Munich

WHAT TO EXPECT:

 * Contribution within the development of safety critical embedded real time SW for aircraft systems according to RTCA/DO-178B, Level A to Level D
 * Autonomous working and project specific processes
 * Support the tailoring of development processes to project-specific needs
 * Support the Specification of Software High Level Requirements
 * Development of Software Low Level Requirements
 * Software Coding in C
 * SW debugging
 * Software integration and analysis
 * Support the design of internal and external interfaces
 * Design / adaptation of existing solutions for new applications by using dedicated/standardized tools
 * Support the definition of “Statement of Works” to be presented to potential suppliers
 * Configuration control / change management of all items produced using applicable CM tools (e.g.
   Synergy, Dimensions) according to applicable Configuration Management Plan


WHAT YOU BRING ALONG:

 * Bachelors'/Masters' degree in software engineering, aerospace engineering, computer science or similar
 * Several years of professional experience in software development
 * Specification of high level and low level software requirements (SRS, SDDD)
 * Technical reviews
 * Programming experience in C and/or Assembler Code
 * Fluent in English & German




Recommended skills:

 * V-model development cycle (preferably of safety critical software acc. to RTCA/DO-178)
 * Experience within the usage of hardware in the loop test facilities
 * Python Test Script Language
 * InCircuit-Debugger (Lauterbach)
 * MISRA guidelines (C)
 * DOORS
 * Configuration management in SVN, or IBM Rational Synergy/Change, or Serena Dimensions
 * IBM - Rational Test RealTime






You will be working for a client company in the aerospace sector.

WHAT WE OFFER:


 * Responsible Tasks
   
 * Flexible working hours
   
 * Networking throughout the group
   
 * Great chances of ongoing employment
   
 * Discounts
   
 * Parking spaces
   
 * Public transport connections
   
 * Attractive compensation
   
 * Flat hierarchies
   
 * Team-oriented work

CONTACT:

Labinot Zeneli
Tel.: +49 7034 656 14808

job_description:
SHORT FACTS

Join us on our journey: We are looking for a driven Principal Software Engineer (d/f/m) with a deep technical understanding and a strategic vision to lead the development of our optimization platform. Your strong curiosity to understand the solution space, combined with a pragmatic approach to delivery, will help us achieve our goals. You share our vision and values and are committed to our mission.


 * Location: Munich, Germany
 * Employment Type: Full-Time, indefinite term
 * Salary Range: € 100.000 - 150.000 per year gross depending on the seniority level
 * Office-first work setup
 * Language Requirement: C1 Level English



YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES



 * Oversee strategic tech team initiatives and develop technical roadmap from prototyping to development in collaboration with senior leadership.
 * Research technological trends, build proofs of concept and drive innovation efforts. Guide their successful permanent implementation and shape groundbreaking technical directions that create value for our business.
 * Collaborate cross-functionally across the whole company to understand the needs of our stakeholders and customers, industry trends and ensure we build the right solutions..
 * Lead the architecture, design and development of our end-to-end optimization platform, encompassing data ingestion and processing, optimization logic implementation, battery control, automated power trading, accounting, and settlement.
 * Take our system to the next level to best leverage our algorithmic and trading capabilities both in backtesting and production, both for immediate go-lives, as well as the strategic long-term evolution of our system.
 * Mentor and guide team members, enhancing their workflows with your extensive knowledge and experience and enabling them to work at their best.
 * Be a role model with respect to software engineering excellence, define and promote engineering best practices, educating engineers and data scientists on designing and delivering maintainable, iterative solutions.
 * Design, maintain and improve our tech stack, development environments, and infrastructure, from service development and testing to integration and monitoring.




YOUR PROFILE

Mandatory requirements


 * 6+ years of experience in Software Engineering (Backend and algorithmic) in the cloud.
 * 3+ years of experience with Python, including object-oriented design.
 * 3+ years of experience in onboarding, mentoring, and coaching colleagues.
 * Proactivity in understanding industry trends and business complementary to technical experience.
 * Proven track record of pragmatic delivery and strategic project execution.
 * Experience working cross-functionally, especially with Product and Data Science teams.
 * Team player with the ability to effectively communicate complex ideas and concepts, as well as work independently on solutions.
 * Experience and enthusiasm for working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.
 * Strategic and analytical thinking.
 * Full business proficiency in English.

Skills to Set You Apart

 * Familiarity with the AWS cloud platform and services like Lambda, DynamoDB, and API Gateway.
 * Experience in the energy industry.
 * Experience with design thinking/sprints.

This role may not be a fit for you if…

 * You don’t have the habit of defining your own tasks and expect other functions to do so.
 * You are used to working in clear separate functions

At Entrix, we are committed to diversity - of backgrounds and experiences. You don’t need 100% of the preferred qualifications to add incredible value to our team. If you’re passionate about what you could accomplish here, we’d love to hear from you.



YOUR BENEFITS



 * Competitive Compensation Package: Including salary, benefits and options
 * Professional Development: Annual development budget of 3,000 € for coachings, trainings, books, etc.
 * Health & Sport Subsidy: Company subsidised sports facilities membership
 * Public Transportation Subsidy: Monthly subsidy to your public transport ticket
 * Lunch/Dinner Allowance Vouchers: Allowance for meals on working days as digital meal vouchers
 * Work Equipment: Mac Book or Windows Laptop and ergonomic workplace
 * Regular Team Events: Knowledge Sessions, Afterwork, Sports, Offsites, Halloween, Pride Month, etc.



A SHORT NOTE FROM YOUR FUTURE LEAD


Sébastien Schikora - Chief Technology Officer

Hi there!

I'm Sebastien Schikora, serving as the CTO at Entrix since June 2022. My diverse career journey has provided me with a range of experiences with a deep dive in the energy industry and the functioning of the grid specifically. In the last years, I was:


 * CTO at KONUX from September 2018 to April 2022, where I played a pivotal role in shaping the company's tech landscape and products.
 * Sr. Manager at Tesla from November 2015 to July 2018, leading the development of energy storage systems and mobile apps.
 * Vice President of Product Development at Networked Energy Services (NES) Corporation from October 2014 to November 2015, launching a new company and product line in the grid digitalization space.
 * At Echelon Corporation, I held various roles over six years, including Director of Product Management and Development in the Grid Modernization Division.
 * Before my endeavors in the Energy Industry I was working for Hewlett Packard in the Enterprise Software group for a little over 10 years.

I'm all about pushing the boundaries of technology and driving progress in our industry. I spent the majority of my career in the Silicon Valley in California and apply a lot of the methods and drive to my workplace here in Munich.

Our team is the basis of our success, and I'm dedicated to fostering a collaborative, innovative and goal driven work environment.

If you're ready to be a part of our international crew and share our vision for groundbreaking tech solutions, I encourage you to explore opportunities within our organization.

Thanks for considering joining us, and I look forward to the possibility of working together to achieve remarkable things.

Best regards,
Sebastien Schikora



YOUR CONTACT IN OUR PEOPLE TEAM

Your contact person is Maria Marin (maria.marin@entrixenergy.com)

If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email to talent@entrixenergy.com

We are looking forward to receiving your application!

ABOUT US

With our AI-powered fully automated optimization and trading platform for flexible energy assets from grid-scale batteries to virtual power plants, we ensure that energy is stored when it is abundant and released into the grid when it is needed. At the same time, by actively trading electricity, we counteract strong price fluctuations that green energies entail. Figuring out how storage provides the best value to the electricity grid and the highest returns to asset owners is how we accelerate the transition to a clean energy future.

  • CTO at KONUX from September 2018 to April 2022, where I played a pivotal role in shaping the company's tech landscape and products.
  • Sr. Manager at Tesla from November 2015 to July 2018, leading the development of energy storage systems and mobile apps.
  • Vice President of Product Development at Networked Energy Services (NES) Corporation from October 2014 to November 2015, launching a new company and product line in the grid digitalization space.
  • At Echelon Corporation, I held various roles over six years, including Director of Product Management and Development in the Grid Modernization Division.
  • Before my endeavors in the Energy Industry I was working for Hewlett Packard in the Enterprise Software group for a little over 10 years.
I'm all about pushing the boundaries of technology and driving progress in our industry. I spent the majority of my career in the Silicon Valley in California and apply a lot of the methods and drive to my workplace here in Munich.

Our team is the basis of our success, and I'm dedicated to fostering a collaborative, innovative and goal driven work environment.

If you're ready to be a part of our international crew and share our vision for groundbreaking tech solutions, I encourage you to explore opportunities within our organization.

Thanks for considering joining us, and I look forward to the possibility of working together to achieve remarkable things.

Best regards,
Sebastien Schikora

Your Contact in our People Team

Your contact person is Maria Marin (maria.marin@entrixenergy.com)

If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email to talent@entrixenergy.com

We are looking forward to receiving your application!

About us

With our AI-powered fully automated optimization and trading platform for flexible energy assets from grid-scale batteries to virtual power plants, we ensure that energy is stored when it is abundant and released into the grid when it is needed. At the same time, by actively trading electricity, we counteract strong price fluctuations that green energies entail. Figuring out how storage provides the best value to the electricity grid and the highest returns to asset owners is how we accelerate the transition to a clean energy future.

job.description:
Short Facts

Join us on our journey: We are looking for a driven Principal Software Engineer (d/f/m) with a deep technical understanding and a strategic vision to lead the development of our optimization platform. Your strong curiosity to understand the solution space, combined with a pragmatic approach to delivery, will help us achieve our goals. You share our vision and values and are committed to our mission.


  • Location: Munich, Germany
  • Employment Type: Full-Time, indefinite term
  • Salary Range: € 100.000 - 150.000 per year gross depending on the seniority level
  • Office-first work setup
  • Language Requirement: C1 Level English

Your Responsibilities

  • Oversee strategic tech team initiatives and develop technical roadmap from prototyping to development in collaboration with senior leadership.
  • Research technological trends, build proofs of concept and drive innovation efforts. Guide their successful permanent implementation and shape groundbreaking technical directions that create value for our business.
  • Collaborate cross-functionally across the whole company to understand the needs of our stakeholders and customers, industry trends and ensure we build the right solutions..
  • Lead the architecture, design and development of our end-to-end optimization platform, encompassing data ingestion and processing, optimization logic implementation, battery control, automated power trading, accounting, and settlement.
  • Take our system to the next level to best leverage our algorithmic and trading capabilities both in backtesting and production, both for immediate go-lives, as well as the strategic long-term evolution of our system.
  • Mentor and guide team members, enhancing their workflows with your extensive knowledge and experience and enabling them to work at their best.
  • Be a role model with respect to software engineering excellence, define and promote engineering best practices, educating engineers and data scientists on designing and delivering maintainable, iterative solutions.
  • Design, maintain and improve our tech stack, development environments, and infrastructure, from service development and testing to integration and monitoring.


Your Profile

Mandatory requirements


  • 6+ years of experience in Software Engineering (Backend and algorithmic) in the cloud.
  • 3+ years of experience with Python, including object-oriented design.
  • 3+ years of experience in onboarding, mentoring, and coaching colleagues.
  • Proactivity in understanding industry trends and business complementary to technical experience.
  • Proven track record of pragmatic delivery and strategic project execution.
  • Experience working cross-functionally, especially with Product and Data Science teams.
  • Team player with the ability to effectively communicate complex ideas and concepts, as well as work independently on solutions.
  • Experience and enthusiasm for working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.
  • Strategic and analytical thinking.
  • Full business proficiency in English.
Skills to Set You Apart
  • Familiarity with the AWS cloud platform and services like Lambda, DynamoDB, and API Gateway.
  • Experience in the energy industry.
  • Experience with design thinking/sprints.
This role may not be a fit for you if…
  • You don’t have the habit of defining your own tasks and expect other functions to do so.
  • You are used to working in clear separate functions
At Entrix, we are committed to diversity - of backgrounds and experiences. You don’t need 100% of the preferred qualifications to add incredible value to our team. If you’re passionate about what you could accomplish here, we’d love to hear from you.

Your Benefits

  • Competitive Compensation Package: Including salary, benefits and options
  • Professional Development: Annual development budget of 3,000 € for coachings, trainings, books, etc.
  • Health & Sport Subsidy: Company subsidised sports facilities membership
  • Public Transportation Subsidy: Monthly subsidy to your public transport ticket
  • Lunch/Dinner Allowance Vouchers: Allowance for meals on working days as digital meal vouchers
  • Work Equipment: Mac Book or Windows Laptop and ergonomic workplace
  • Regular Team Events: Knowledge Sessions, Afterwork, Sports, Offsites, Halloween, Pride Month, etc.

A Short Note from Your Future Lead


Sébastien Schikora - Chief Technology Officer

Hi there!

I'm Sebastien Schikora, serving as the CTO at Entrix since June 2022. My diverse career journey has provided me with a range of experiences with a deep dive in the energy industry and the functioning of the grid specifically. In the last years, I was:


  • CTO at KONUX from September 2018 to April 2022, where I played a pivotal role in shaping the company's tech landscape and products.
  • Sr. Manager at Tesla from November 2015 to July 2018, leading the development of energy storage systems and mobile apps.
  • Vice President of Product Development at Networked Energy Services (NES) Corporation from October 2014 to November 2015, launching a new company and product line in the grid digitalization space.
  • At Echelon Corporation, I held various roles over six years, including Director of Product Management and Development in the Grid Modernization Division.
  • Before my endeavors in the Energy Industry I was working for Hewlett Packard in the Enterprise Software group for a little over 10 years.
I'm all about pushing the boundaries of technology and driving progress in our industry. I spent the majority of my career in the Silicon Valley in California and apply a lot of the methods and drive to my workplace here in Munich.

Our team is the basis of our success, and I'm dedicated to fostering a collaborative, innovative and goal driven work environment.

If you're ready to be a part of our international crew and share our vision for groundbreaking tech solutions, I encourage you to explore opportunities within our organization.

Thanks for considering joining us, and I look forward to the possibility of working together to achieve remarkable things.

Best regards,
Sebastien Schikora

Your contact person is Maria Marin (maria.marin@entrixenergy.com)

If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email to talent@entrixenergy.com

job_description:
DevOps Engineer (m/w/d) in Berlin

Ihr Aufgabenbereich

 * Weiterentwicklung und Automatisierung der Software-Betriebsprozesse
 * Konzeption und Planung hochverfügbarer Software-Architekturen und -
   Infrastrukturen
 * Aufbau und ständige Weiterentwicklung sowie Optimierung des Monitorings
   großer Software-Umgebungen
 * Entwurf und Implementierung sicherer Laufzeitumgebungen
 * Fachliche und technologische Beratung der Verantwortlichen beim Design des
   Software-LifeCycles
 * Implementierung und Pflege von CI/CD-Pipelines, Bugfixing, -tracking,
   2nd/3rd Level Support
 * Dokumentation von Arbeitsergebnissen und Systemen sowie Mitarbeit an der
   Weiterentwicklung der Dokumentationsplattform



Ihr Profil

 * Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium der Informatik oder eine vergleichbare
   Qualifikation
 * Praktische Erfahrungen mit Skriptsprachen und gute Programmierkenntnisse
   im Java- oder .NET-Umfeld
 * Kenntnisse in der Automatisierung der Software-Bereitstellung (AWX,
   Kubernetes)
 * Gute Kenntnisse von Monitoring-Tools (CheckMK, Kibana, Elastic Search, …)
 * Sicherer Umgang mit Versionskontrollsystemen und erste Erfahrungen im
   Enterprise Network Bereich
 * Kundenorientierung, Teamfähigkeit sowie Bereitschaft zur kontinuierlichen
   Weiterbildung
 * Hohe Belastbarkeit, sehr gutes Kommunikationsvermögen und Motivation

Ihre Vorteile

 * Gemeinsam mehr erreichen: Toller Teamspirit in einem kompetenten und
   zukunftssicheren Arbeitsumfeld mit einzigartigen Projekten
 * Attraktive Arbeitsbedingungen: Ausgewogene Balance zwischen Beruf und
   Privatleben dank flexibler Arbeitsmodelle und -zeiten sowie 30 Tagen Urlaub
   im Jahr
 * Moderne Arbeitsausstattung: Top Equipment, agile Entwicklungsmethoden
   mit modernem Tech Stack und innovativen Kollaborationstools
 * Persönliche Entwicklung: Individuelle Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten sowie
   Fach- und Führungskräfteprogramme
 * Optimale Verkehrsanbindung: Attraktiver Standort mit sehr guter
   Anbindung an den öffentlichen Nahverkehr
 * Angebote zum Gesundbleiben: Sportkooperationen, Präventionskurse und
   Laufevents
 * Weitere Extras: Betriebliche Altersvorsorge, vermögenswirksame Leistungen,
   unterstützende Maßnahmen bei der Kinderbetreuung und der Pflege von
   Angehörigen

Fühlst du dich angesprochen? Dann Bewirb dich jetzt.

job_description:
Summary

Posted: Nov 14, 2024

Weekly Hours: 40

Role Number:200574847

We're seeking research interns to create breakthrough innovations in machine learning, computer vision, computer graphics, and related areas. We are particularly interested in photorealistic image synthesis, frontier models, and the interface of AI and science.

Description

You will work directly with an organization of world-class machine learning researchers and engineers. Our work powers cutting-edge technologies across the Apple ecosystem and is published in the most selective scientific journals and conferences.

Minimum Qualifications

 * Currently has or is in the process of obtaining a Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, or relevant technical field
 * 6 months dedication is preferred, and starting no later than March 2025
 * A demonstrable record of publishing academic research in top-tier peer-reviewed venues
 * Solid software engineering skills in complex, multi-language systems. Fluency in Python.


Preferred Qualifications

 * Expertise in ML algorithms and top practices for working with deep learning systems
 * Proficiency with ML modeling frameworks (PyTorch, Tensorflow, etc.)
 * Strong overall software development approach. You deliver clean, well-tested code.

job_description:
Wir - die HvS-Consulting GmbH – sind Spezialisten für Cyber Security und davon überzeugt, dass die Werte unserer Gesellschaft auch im Cyber-Raum geschützt werden müssen. Deshalb helfen wir Organisationen, sich mit dem richtigen Zusammenspiel aus Technologien, Prozessen und Menschen selbst zu schützen. Unser Motto lautet „People – Process – Technology“.

Für unser Team in Garching bei München suchen wir ab sofort eine(n)


SOFTWARE-ENGINEER (M/W/D)

Das erwartet Dich:

 * Baue spannende, technisch anspruchsvolle Produkte auf einem modernen Technologie-Stack:
   * Mit unseren eigens entwickelten Cyber-Labs schaffen wir gewollt hackbare Systeme, in denen ITler durch die Brille der Angreifenden Systeme und Software auf Herz und Nieren testen können. Du schaffst mit uns eine interaktive Hackingumgebung die signifikant die menschengemachten Risiken in der IT reduziert
   * Im Rahmen unserer Security Kampagnen helfen wir Unternehmen unter anderem mit Phishing-Simulationen. Entwickle mit uns unsere eigene Plattform, um Phishing Kampagnen zu erstellen, zu steuern und durchzuführen
   * Unsere IS-FOX Awareness Plattform machen wir Mitarbeiterschulungen einfach. Mit unserem neuartigen Verwaltungs-, Identitäts- und E-Learning-System automatisierst du mit uns L&D-Prozesse in Unternehmen
 * Entwickle und designe robuste, moderne Cloud-native Anwendungen in Azure
 * Mit unseren Tools und Projekten schaffen wir Abwechslung bei der Produktsoftwareentwicklung und bieten die Möglichkeit neuen Technologien zu evaluieren die unsere Kollegen mit eigens entwickelter Software unterstützt
 * Wir unterstützen Dich darin Deine eigenen Ideen einzubringen, zu verwirklichen und Verantwortung zu übernehmen
 * You build it, You run it, You automate it – wir kümmern uns auch um unsere Produktionsumgebung
 * Du arbeitest nach professionellen Software-Engineering Standards (SOLID-Principles, Test Driven Development, Domain Drive Design, …)

Das bringst du mit:

 * Erfahrung mit .NET, C# & relationalen Datenbankensystemen
 * Erfahrung mit Angular oder vergleichbaren Frontend-Frameworks
 * Ein abgeschlossenes Informatikstudium oder vergleichbare Qualifikation
 * Mindestens 2 Jahre Berufserfahrung im Bereich Softwareentwicklung wünschenswert
 * Interesse in Docker, Python, Go und Infrastructure as Code & Automatisierung
 * Lust in einem jungen Team zu arbeiten bei dem jede Stimme zählt

Was dich aber vor allem erwartet:

Ein abwechslungsreicher und vielseitiger Job in einem (aus unserer Sicht) spannendsten Themengebiet überhaupt. Und das in einem Unternehmen in dem wirklich jede Meinung gehört und geschätzt wird – vom Praktikanten bis zur Geschäftsführung. Uns gibt dieser Job nicht nur Gehalt, sondern auch persönliche Zufriedenheit, weil wir wirklich etwas bewirken und die Welt ein Stück sicherer machen.

Bei uns gibt es (natürlich) kostenlose Getränke, Kaffee und Snacks, aber das ist heutzutage Standard. Zusätzlich bieten wir auf Wunsch attraktive Benefits, von Jobticket bis hin zu Kindergartenzuschuss. Flexible Arbeitszeiten und die Möglichkeit, auch mobil zu arbeiten, geben Dir maximale Flexibilität für die ungeplanten Dinge des Alltags. Schau dir unsere Benefits gerne auf unserer Karriereseite genauer an.

Was erwartet Dich noch? Wir haben eine wertschätzende Unternehmenskultur (schau mal auf Kununu) und schätzen eigenständiges Arbeiten, natürlich auch, aber nicht nur im Home-Office. Schließlich haben wir ein modernes Büro in Garching mit sensationellem Alpenblick, in dem wir gerne gemeinsam Mittagessen und uns mit unseren Security Auditoren, Incident Respondern, Awareness Trainern und Multimedia-Designern austauschen.

Negativ ist das sie erst nach Ende der Probezeit verfügbar sind.

job.description:
Wir - die HvS-Consulting GmbH – sind Spezialisten für Cyber Security und davon überzeugt, dass die Werte unserer Gesellschaft auch im Cyber-Raum geschützt werden müssen. Deshalb helfen wir Organisationen, sich mit dem richtigen Zusammenspiel aus Technologien, Prozessen und Menschen selbst zu schützen. Unser Motto lautet „People – Process – Technology“.

Für unser Team in Garching bei München suchen wir ab sofort eine(n)

Software-Engineer (m/w/d)

Das erwartet Dich:

  • Baue spannende, technisch anspruchsvolle Produkte auf einem modernen Technologie-Stack:
    • Mit unseren eigens entwickelten Cyber-Labs schaffen wir gewollt hackbare Systeme, in denen ITler durch die Brille der Angreifenden Systeme und Software auf Herz und Nieren testen können. Du schaffst mit uns eine interaktive Hackingumgebung die signifikant die menschengemachten Risiken in der IT reduziert
    • Im Rahmen unserer Security Kampagnen helfen wir Unternehmen unter anderem mit Phishing-Simulationen. Entwickle mit uns unsere eigene Plattform, um Phishing Kampagnen zu erstellen, zu steuern und durchzuführen
    • Unsere IS-FOX Awareness Plattform machen wir Mitarbeiterschulungen einfach. Mit unserem neuartigen Verwaltungs-, Identitäts- und E-Learning-System automatisierst du mit uns L&D-Prozesse in Unternehmen
  • Entwickle und designe robuste, moderne Cloud-native Anwendungen in Azure
  • Mit unseren Tools und Projekten schaffen wir Abwechslung bei der Produktsoftwareentwicklung und bieten die Möglichkeit neuen Technologien zu evaluieren die unsere Kollegen mit eigens entwickelter Software unterstützt
  • Wir unterstützen Dich darin Deine eigenen Ideen einzubringen, zu verwirklichen und Verantwortung zu übernehmen
  • You build it, You run it, You automate it – wir kümmern uns auch um unsere Produktionsumgebung
  • Du arbeitest nach professionellen Software-Engineering Standards (SOLID-Principles, Test Driven Development, Domain Drive Design, …)

Das bringst du mit:

  • Erfahrung mit .NET, C# & relationalen Datenbankensystemen
  • Erfahrung mit Angular oder vergleichbaren Frontend-Frameworks
  • Ein abgeschlossenes Informatikstudium oder vergleichbare Qualifikation
  • Mindestens 2 Jahre Berufserfahrung im Bereich Softwareentwicklung wünschenswert
  • Interesse in Docker, Python, Go und Infrastructure as Code & Automatisierung
  • Lust in einem jungen Team zu arbeiten bei dem jede Stimme zählt

Was dich aber vor allem erwartet:

Ein abwechslungsreicher und vielseitiger Job in einem (aus unserer Sicht) spannendsten Themengebiet überhaupt. Und das in einem Unternehmen in dem wirklich jede Meinung gehört und geschätzt wird – vom Praktikanten bis zur Geschäftsführung. Uns gibt dieser Job nicht nur Gehalt, sondern auch persönliche Zufriedenheit, weil wir wirklich etwas bewirken und die Welt ein Stück sicherer machen.

Bei uns gibt es (natürlich) kostenlose Getränke, Kaffee und Snacks, aber das ist heutzutage Standard. Zusätzlich bieten wir auf Wunsch attraktive Benefits, von Jobticket bis hin zu Kindergartenzuschuss. Flexible Arbeitszeiten und die Möglichkeit, auch mobil zu arbeiten, geben Dir maximale Flexibilität für die ungeplanten Dinge des Alltags. Schau dir unsere Benefits gerne auf unserer Karriereseite genauer an.

Was erwartet Dich noch? Wir haben eine wertschätzende Unternehmenskultur (schau mal auf Kununu) und schätzen eigenständiges Arbeiten, natürlich auch, aber nicht nur im Home-Office. Schließlich haben wir ein modernes Büro in Garching mit sensationellem Alpenblick, in dem wir gerne gemeinsam Mittagessen und uns mit unseren Security Auditoren, Incident Respondern, Awareness Trainern und Multimedia-Designern austauschen.

ceo.name: Michael Hochenrieder and Frank von Stetten

job_description:
Permanent employee, Full-time · München


STELLENBESCHREIBUNG

Als Java Software Engineer (m/w/d) erwarten Dich echte Herausforderungen in modernen Programmiersprachen, sehr gutes Betriebsklima, motivierte und freundliche Kolleginnen und Kollegen sowie flache Hierarchien. Wir bieten eine gute Work-Life Balance, faire Bezahlung und sehr gute Sozialleistungen. An Deinem zentral gelegenen Arbeitsplatz erledigst Du abwechslungsreiche und erfüllende Tätigkeiten, und hast ausreichend Zeit, um stabile und anspruchsvolle state-of-the-art Software Lösungen zu entwickeln bzw. den reibungslosen Betrieb diverser Systeme auf Kundenseite sicher zu stellen. Bei uns erhältst Du die Möglichkeit eigene Produkte zu entwickeln und diese zu optimieren.

DEINE AUFGABEN

 * Du trägst aktiv zur Weiterentwicklung bestehender Softwarenanwendungen und zur Gestaltung komplett neuer Entwicklungen bei.
 * Du bist für die Konzeption und Entwicklung maßgeschneiderter IT-Lösungen für unsere Kunden verantwortlich.
 * Du wirkst im gesamten Software-Entwicklungsprozess mit, angefangen bei der Analyse über das Design bis hin zu Implementierung, dem Test und dem Rollout.
 * Du übernimmst die Verantwortung für Architektur und Design für komplette IT-Lösungen.

DEIN PROFIL

 * Du verfügst über fundierte Kenntnisse und mehrjährige Erfahrung in den Bereichen Software, Architektur, Design und Entwicklung im Umfeld Java oder C++.
 * Du hast bereits erste Projekterfahrungen mit agilen Methoden gesammelt.
 * Du bringst Know How bezüglich Continuous Integration und Continuous Delivery, inklusive der in diesem Kontext relevanten Open-Source-Tools mit.
 * Ein hohes Prozess- und Konzeptverständnis zeichnen Dich ebenso aus, wie die Beherrschung der konkreten Technologie.
 * Idealerweise bringst Du Berufserfahrung im Banken- oder Finanzumfeld mit.
 * Kundenorientierung und Freude am Kundenkontakt sind für Dich wesentliche Elemente Deiner Tätigkeit.
 * Du hast Spaß an Projektarbeit.
 * Verhandlungssicheres Englisch und gute Deutschkenntnisse runden Dein Profil ab.

UNSERE BENEFITS

 * Eine familiäre Arbeitsatmosphäre mit offener Kommunikation, flachen Hierarchien und kurzen Entscheidungswegen
 * Ein sicheres und modernes Arbeitsumfeld mit der Möglichkeit zum Mobilen Arbeiten innerhalb Deutschlands und der Möglichkeit zur Workation innerhalb der EU über einen festgelegten Zeitraum hinweg
 * Persönlicher Gestaltungsspielraum und eigenverantwortliches Arbeiten
 * 30 Tage Urlaub, sowie den 24.12 und 31.12 zusätzlich frei
 * Maßgeschneiderte, individuelle Weiterbildungsangebote
 * Betriebliche Altersvorsorge
 * Zugang zum Corporate Benefits Portal
 * Urban Sports Club Mitgliedschaft
 * Zuschuss zur Bildschirmarbeitsplatzbrille
 * Mobiltelefon, auch zur privaten Nutzung
 * Firmenveranstaltungen



ÜBER UNS

Die Be Group unterstützt die führenden Finanzdienstleister Europas, um Lösungen für komplexe Herausforderungen zu definieren. Gemeinsam mit unseren Kunden erreichen wir anspruchsvolle Ziele, wie das (Re-)Design von Business Models, Anpassungen an regulatorische Anforderungen oder den Einstieg in die digitale Ära. Wir sind überzeugt, dass sich Erfolg durch partnerschaftlichen Umgang und der Leidenschaft für Höchstleistungen erzielen lässt.

Das stets wachsende Team der Be Group besteht aus mehr als 1.500 hochqualifizierten Experten, die Branchenwissen mit umfangreicher Praxiserfahrung kombinieren. Wir arbeiten mit lokalen und globalen Akteuren und gestalten somit die gegenwärtige als auch die künftige Finanzlandschaft maßgeblich mit. Die Be Group bietet ihren Kunden strategische und operative Dienstleistungen, angefangen vom Management Consulting bis hin zur Lösungsentwicklung mit eigenen Produkten.

In Deutschland blickt die Be Shaping the Future- Performance, Transformation, Digital GmbH auf eine lange Historie als zuverlässiger Partner im Finanzmarkt. Die wichtigsten Erfolgsfaktoren sind eine Kombination von fachlichem und IT-Know-How, Methodenkompetenz und partnerschaftlicher Umgang mit unseren Kunden und Mitarbeitern.

Seit der Gründung unseres Unternehmens im Jahr 1998 haben wir unser Leistungsspektrum kontinuierlich erweitert und angepasst. Für unser weiteres Wachstum suchen wir nach Talenten mit Erfahrung und Leidenschaft, um unsere Kunden in einer stetig komplexer werdenden Welt optimal unterstützen zu können.

job_description:
JUNIOR MECHANICAL SYSTEM ENGINEER – REQUIREMENTS AND CONFIGURATION CONTROL MANAGEMENT

We are in search of a junior Mechanical System Engineer with a background in aerospace engineering to support our team for requirements management and configuration control management.

As a Mechanical System Engineer you will have a unique opportunity to join our multicultural and motivated team, committed to delivering value and creative services together with our clients and partners in the European space sector.

You will work within a multi-functional environment capable of fulfilling our technical objectives and ultimately bring value to our team by improving designs, bringing new insight into our design philosophies, and influencing technical decisions made in multiple ongoing projects.

The Mechanical System Engineer role at LSS is a varied role that includes all technical and management engineering functions specific to a project. The position to be filled would focus in particular in requirements management, consolidation, flow down and verification, as well as configuration management, working closely with the design, analysis, system, quality and test departments. This is a junior position, but according to your drive and capacity, you may quickly be growing into other responsibilities within the systems engineering team.


IN YOUR NEW ROLE YOU WILL…

 * Consolidate and structure the requirements applicable to our deployable space structures.
 * Perform requirements flow-down for our internal, subcontractors and suppliers.
 * Influence new product design via sound, succinct, data-driven requirements analysis.
 * Aid in the definition of project scope in agreement with stakeholders.
 * Support Business Development by performing critical review of system-level requirements for incoming projects.
 * Work closely with the different disciplines within the company for the generation and evaluation of component concepts.
 * Work closely with the Verification Manager to establish a coherent and actionable verification strategy.
 * Maintain the Verification Control Documents and support the production and maintenance of the Verification Plans.
 * Ensure Configuration Control of the system across the different disciplines.
 * Produce documentation and results tailored to business needs.


YOU WILL SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE BECAUSE YOU…

 * Have a degree (FH/Univ.) in Mechanical/Aerospace Engineering, or similar qualification.
 * Have strong analytical and synthesis skills, being both capable of seeing the “big picture” and understanding how it applies to the different actors involved.
 * Have excellent English skills (oral and written), German is beneficial but not necessary.
 * Have the ability to work in a team and excellent communication skills to interface with partners.
 * Are eligible to work in EU without restriction.
 * Are able to learn quickly and use initiative to understand complex systems, with their inherent dependencies.
 * Are able to work to tight deadlines and manage one’s own time and the demanding expectations of the projects

Beneficial:

 * Familiarity with space projects and with ESA and ECSS standards are highly desirable.
 * Some experience in a design engineering role in European space/aerospace projects.
 * Knowledge of DOORS or other Requirements Management Software.
 * Formal knowledge of Systems Engineering (e.g. INCOSE).


YOUR BENEFITS:

 * Flexible working hours with a core time
 * A relaxed working environment with a flat hierarchy combined with a motivated and open team
 * Modern office space with well-developed infrastructure (shops, restaurants, gym etc.)
 * Good connection to public transportation (~6 Minutes walking distance to U-Bahn)
 * Casual dress code
 * Coffee, milk and fruits are provided
 * Scope for individual development and growth in a growing multicultural team of discipline experts
 * A challenging, fast-paced position at the forefront of space technology
 * The opportunity to work collaboratively on multiple concurrent projects.

Note: If you are unable to submit the application, please send your cover letter and CV to career@largespace.de.

Note: If you are unable to submit the application, please send your cover letter and CV to career@largespace.de.

job_description:
Summary

Posted: Oct 9, 2024

Role Number:200572579

Apple Silicon Engineering Group has an opportunity for a forward-thinking and unusually creative Hardware-minded Software engineers to build innovative tools to design the next generation of Apple’s world-leading systems-on-chip (SOCs) Apple’s multi-billion-transistor Ax SOCs are the brain of every iPhone and iPad. The Analog Mixed-Signal (AMS) circuits connect them to the physical world via complex IPs such as SERDES for data communication, PLLs for clock generation, and sensors for measuring physical quantities. Modeling Software Engineers bring a unique and versatile combination of software and hardware expertise. On their way from the designer's mind to becoming a piece of silicon, circuits take form in software. You will develop those software-representations of future hardware, and then make them real.

Description

Work on a simulation platform connecting multiple simulators to design analog mixed-signal IPs Design and development of Scientific Software package/framework Develop custom hardware description libraries, frameworks, and/or languages Design digital, analog, and mixed-signal simulation software. This includes both the circuits themselves, and the underlying tools to enable hundreds more designers. We use modern software design methodology and apply it to AMS Hardware design. If you've written software in modern, designer-centric languages then you understand how powerful and freeing it can be. And If you've designed circuits, you know how hard it can be. Think of the IC-design tool-stack by analogy: RTL is C code, Schematics and gates are assembly, and Layout is machine language. Most IC design happens at one of those three layers, and most modern software design happens at a higher, more productive level. Tools handle the boring stuff and free designers to express their ideas. This is an opportunity to build that layer for IC hardware, and then use it to make the world's best mobile silicon. Core responsibilities: Architect, develop and test software to capture the behavior and performance of AMS circuits. Some indicators that you'd love this job: - You wish that designing circuits felt more like writing Python code - Passion for building software to represent complex physical systems - Avid usage of - or contributions to - open-source scientific computing software - especially packages for hardware design, signal processing, and/or data analysis - An open mind about trying new things. Especially new tools

Minimum Qualifications

 * Expert level in Python and/or C++
 * Expert in Object-oriented Software (OOP)
 * Knowledge of Database frontend and backend
 * Familiarity with simulation tools for analog, digital, and/ or mixed-signal circuits
 * Familiarity with popular digital design HDLs (Verilog and/or VHDL)
 * Understanding of specs and requirements for AMS circuits is a plus


Preferred Qualifications

 * MS/PhD EE/CE, or industry experience equivalent
 * Apple is an Equal Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. We also take affirmative action to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all applicants, including minorities, women, protected veterans, and individuals with disabilities. Apple will not discriminate or retaliate against applicants who inquire about, disclose, or discuss their compensation or that of other applicants.

job_description:
Team spirit and initiative are your most prominent strengths and you are motivated to develop a long-term career in Intellectual Property, in a multicultural work environment? Then we are looking forward to receiving your application. Your contact person is Till Berthold.

Your profile
 * Keen interest in technology and software development
 * Currently enrolled in a technical bachelor’s or master’s degree program in computer science, physics, mathematics, or a related field
 * Familiar with Python programming language
 * Familiar with Web development basics
 * Interest and background knowledge in machine learning and AI
 * Good communication and presentation skills in German and English


Your tasks
 * Support our software engineers in development of our B2B SaaS product
 * Work closely together with both R&D and business to gather requirements and understand the operational context of the software
 * Familiarize yourself with software development processes and help us to think "out of the box"


What we offer
 * An open, team-oriented and creative working atmosphere with flat hierarchies and a quick decision making process
 * An adequate and motivating remuneration package
 * Flexible business hours, various benefits and an outstanding company culture.
 * Intensive training delivered by our top specialists
 * The opportunity to grow within a quality-driven company


Dennemeyer is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Dennemeyer does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin, veteran status or any other basis covered by appropriate law. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need.
